diegetic.text.compass.missing_lodestone: §fLodestone is in another dimension or was destroyed.
diegetic.text.recovery_compass.unknown_d: §7Last death location is in another dimension or does not exist.
gamerule.diegetic.clockUses_server_time: If clocks are enabled, clocks will display the server's (IRL) time.
gamerule.diegetic.lodestone_compass_rela: Compasses associated with lodestones will provide relative coordinates to their lodestone.
gamerule.diegetic.recovery_compass_relat: Recovery-compasses will provide relate coordinates to last known death location.
gamerule.diegetic.slime_chunk_checking: Slimeballs inform if current chunk is a slime-chunk.
